Title: Requires insurer to respond within thirty days of a request from an insured for their health plan documents
Summary: Requires insurer to respond within thirty days of a written request from an insured for their health plan documents, including copies of most recent group or individual contracts.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-a & 4324, Ins L; amd §4408, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to disclosure and access to health insurance plan documents
